channel.title: RuneLocus: I've found a few things out
channel.description:
Well, I went onto RuneLocus' IRC network (irc.godirc.com), and found a channel where someone has been testing botnets in, #godnet. I asked Ikiliki about it, and Ikiliki and Tico135 (I know Tico135 had nothing to do with it, he's on our side :D) asked me how I found out, and MADE sure I answered. I just answered with someone told me. I managed to get these logs, before I was banned from that channel:
[23:50:25] * Now talking in #godnet [23:50:25] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:25] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:25] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:26] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:27] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:27] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:27] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:28] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:28] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:28] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:28] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:31] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:31] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:32] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:32] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:33] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:34] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:34] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:34] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:34] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:35] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:35] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80 [23:50:35] HTTP flooding moparisthebest.com on port 80
I find it funny, how when I join the channel is banned, and the USERS command is disabled on the channel.

item.title: RuneLocus: I've found a few things out
item.dc:creator: @Jython super_
item.description:
@Jython wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:11, topic:239851”][quote author=casey. link=topic=316113.msg2511869#msg2511869 date=1225323050]
Ikilki isn’t smart enough to make a botnet.
[/quote]
However, super_ is.[/quote]

bumped just to call you a faggot.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 13, 2009, 04:50:15 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Yz85Racer, post:13, topic:239851”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=316113.msg2512322#msg2512322 date=1225341068]
Whoever made this botnet wasn’t the smartest bulb in the pack anyhow. The way it handles requests is super detectable.
[/quote]
Must be super_… see what I did there?[/quote]

Again, you’re a faggot.

Read full topic
item.source: RuneLocus: I've found a few things out

item.title: RuneLocus: I've found a few things out
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:19, topic:239851”][quote author=Tree link=topic=316113.msg2512526#msg2512526 date=1225367340]

The plot thickens.

It’s all rather simple.
How the hell does it thicken?
[/quote]
I’ve always wanted to say that.
I have no idea what’s going on or who’s to blame or why.[/quote]
tis a good thing to say, makes for some epicness in examns

Read full topic
